title: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A7 LTE 3 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 10.4 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Gold)

product_specification.Additional Features: Quad Stereo Speakers with Dolby Atmos Surround Sound, 15W Fast Charging Support
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Travel Adapter (White, 7.75W), Data Cable (USB Type C (1 m), White), SIM Ejector Pin, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, Light Sensor
product_specification.Bluetooth Profiles: A2DP, AVRCP, DI, HFP, HID, HOGP, HSP, MAP, OPP, PAN, PBAP
product_specification.Other Display Features: WUXGA TFT Touch Display (80% Screen to Body Ratio)
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: MP4, M4V, 3GP, 3G2, WMV, ASF, AVI, FLV, MKV, WEBM
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: MP3, M4A, 3GA, AAC, OGG, OGA, WAV, WMA, AMR, AWB, FLAC, MID, MIDI, XMF, MXMF, IMY, RTTTL, RTX, OTA
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty Provided by the Manufacturer from Date of Purchase

product_description.Keep Yourself Entertained: Experience your content in theatre-like quality on a great screen with rich creamy audio. The 26.31-cm (10.4) dynamic display and Dolby Atmos surround sound with a quad-speaker setup make your content come to life.
product_description.Performance: Explore your interests, share creative ideas and set the path to inspired living with the Samsung A7. With a sleek design, top-notch performance and an exuberant entertainment system, it's time to open new windows and experience the world in a new light.
product_description.Processor: Experience smooth gaming and quicker load times, thanks to the powerful RAM with faster processing speeds. The massive 7,040 mAh (typical) battery lets you breeze through the day without the constant worry of charging. If you ever run low, the 15 W fast charger will get you up and running in no time.
product_description.Storage: Delete less and store more. With 32 GB of internal storage and a MicroSD slot that allows you to expand your storage upto 1 TB, the Galaxy Tab A7 enables you to access all your photos, high-resolution videos and other files right at your fingertips.
product_description.YouTube Premium: Galaxy Tab and YouTube Premium have come together to make sure you have an uninterrupted YouTube viewing experience. Avail 2 months of ad-free, offline, and background play services on YouTube when you purchase the Galaxy Tab A7.
product_description.Dark Mode: The Dark mode option is a cool feature that allows you to reduce strain on your eyes, especially in an environment with lower ambient light. This feature also reduces your battery consumption and can be easily accessed via the Quick Panel.
product_description.Share Your Moments: Sharing content has never been easier. The Galaxy Tab A7 helps bring your close ones even closer by letting you share photos, notes, reminders and calendar events quickly and easily.
product_description.Sync Your Phone: The Galaxy Tab A7 lets you sync your Galaxy smartphone so you stay connected at all times. The Auto-Hotspot feature allows your device to connect automatically in the absence of Wi-Fi so you can stay in the loop without missing out on any calls or texts.
product_description.Keep in Touch: Thanks to the Galaxy A7 tab with Google Duo, you can keep in constant contact with your loved ones.
product_description.Samsung Knox: Thanks to Samsung Knox, this tablet comes loaded with military-grade security. Keep your private data safe and secure from hackers, malware and malicious attacks.
product_description.Samsung Kids: With Samsung Kids, you can get your little ones to have fun while learning and playing through this application. This app entertains and encourages kids to develop, learn and flourish. All you have to do is go to the Quick Panel and start.
product_description.Digital Steps: With Samsung Kids, you can get your kids to start their digital journey in a safe yet fun way. You can set limitations on apps, playtimes and contacts. It also offers usage records so that you can see exactly what your kids are doing.

review:
Positives are display quality, easy on eyes for long hour usage, battery backup, sleekness, Samsung security, sound output.
Negatives (to my opinion) are: A bit slow (at times even hangs for a second or so), Samsung should've given at least 4GB RAM in 22k version but that might have hurt the sales of S6 Lite, not as effective wifi reception as compared to modern mid-range phones still manageable, most important problem that I found (which no one discussed here in reviews or on youtube videos) is that in the LTE version you can avail the calling facility only on loudspeaker mode (tablet's main speakers are used for call output, no inbuilt micro-earpiece as given in phones). So if you want to use it for calling purposes, then an external earphone is must; otherwise everyone around you will be listening to the conversation. This was a big, unpleasant surprise for me.
Still a pretty much considerable option if you are looking for a table for normal educational and media consumption purposes in and around 20k.
Still one of the least
It is one of the best tablet and the most affordable one. Best for entertainment and studies. Great speakers and performance. Highly recommend it. 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

I was very hopeful when I purchased this item, I don't know whether flipkart is going to hide this comment or not but worst performance on mobile hotspot connection..none of the google applications are working..got very frustrated...for ur kind information my mobile net speed is very good and I enjoy great Speed at other devices over hotspot..but this is a nightmare purchase..

Excellent budget tablet for media consumtion and browsing the internet, did not test with any game. Brilliant screen, solid sound and good battery life. Bought the one with 4g modem so anytime and anywhere access of internet without the need of a hotspot.

This is a good tablet for watching multimedia content. A big plus for the tablet is quad speaker setup, which gives a decent and high volume audio for watching videos and movies. I recommend buying a portable foid stand which makes your video experience more delighted
Amazing product this price range. It is 4g+ supported so Data Speed very fast. Pubg very smooth running with use gfx tool extreme setting.
GOOD BATTERY BACKUP, VERY IMPRESSIVE DISPLAY AND BUTTERY SMOOTH PERFORMANCE !! NICE PRODUCT !! AS EXPECTED !! THANKYOU FLIPKART.

Very nice product
Very slim and smooth
Back camera is nice
But selfie camera is good

Good tab.. Dolby Atmos indeed have a good effect on sound. Battery life us too good. Very big screen and its heavy too,

This tablet is value for money and i loved it❤️....
1. Performance is good but battery backup is not too good or not so bad,overall its ok.

3.For study purpose.... and for movie watching,this tab is really very helpful.
😄_That's all_😄

This is a great entry level tablet. Samsung has struck a right balance between features and performance. During online education days this is a very useful device. A 4G LTE version that I am using makes life more portable. Take your work anywhere and you can attend from anywhere. Camera is not at all good but enough for video calls and emergency photos. Display also could have been better. Display PPI is poor. Colours and viewing angles are good. Video quality and playback is good. Battery life is also good. In 4G LTE version you can use this as mobile phone. Calling and WhatsApp/Signal are possible with this tablet. All mobile phone apps are compatible. Consider this tablet as a big screen mobile. Whatever you can do on Android phone, you can do on this 4G LTE Samsung Galaxy A7 tablet. Samsung is also giving timely updates to software and improving performance.
I feel this is one fo the good Tab in this budget and value for money. Over all I liked the performance and I feel Camara need to be improved
